articles.author: BRUCE SHIPKOWSKI
articles.title: American Water, the largest water utility in US, is targeted by a cyberattack - The Associated Press
articles.description: The largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S. says it was the victim of a cyberattack, prompting the firm to pause billing to customers. New Jersey-based American Water provides services to more than 14 million people in 14 states and…
articles.content:
The largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the United States announced Monday that it was the victim of a cyberattack, prompting the firm to pause billing to customers.

articles.title: Russian court sentences 72-year-old American to prison for fighting in Ukraine - POLITICO
articles.description: Stephen Hubbard was sentenced to six years and 10 months.
articles.content:
Hubbard, from the state of Michigan, is the first American known to have been convicted on charges of fighting as a mercenary in the Ukrainian conflict.
